div.bibl: Otthon, Mar. 1, 1931. NEWS FROM THE BURNSIDE HUNGARIAN EVANGELICAL REFORMED CHURCH

body.p: p. 2...Communion during Lent; three hundred and twenty one members partook of the Sacrament of the Lord's Supper.
Sunday School. Our Sunday School has one hundred sixty four enrolled members. In the near future we hope to reach one hundred and seventy-five;collection this Sunday was $5.62.
